Summary: very bright white ball of light, very big, no stars or moon in the sky, visible after thunder/lightning storm
divs: sighting detailsit was thursday evening, i was driving down a new development area where there is minimal lighting and the sky was very dark and cloudy. there had just been a massive thunder and lightning storm. my kid & i drive by there all the time, dulles international airport is nearby so seeing flying objects is not uncommon, except we saw a set of 3 lights that were were flying vertical as if the craft was flying in a "standing" position, except once we looked closer, it was 3 globes of white light perfectly parallel over each other, but were individual. so i thought, :wow" another ufo...(my daughter & i seem to attract them)i've never taken a picture though. but as we came into the nighborhood, where there are barely any street lights & is very dark,(as u will see in the video) we noticed a very large, glowing ball of light which was obviously not a star!!! at first, i felt weird and sort of uneasy, like we had been "followed" or "watched". my daughter seemed very excited. we were further away from airport flight traffic by now. i pulled the car over, (there were no other vehicles present) and placed the camara on top of the car to take a picture, my camara has a movement focus setting( i take a lot of concert\sport event pics which action snaps still & focused as if the singer or athelete was standing motionless). i didn't realize it til later but i actually got a short video as i was trying to set the camara & you can hear my daughter commenting,"there's the ufo". the video was shot @ 2154hrs & the first still picture at 2156hrs. i snapped 6 pictures, not moving the cemara from its place, the pics are about 30-45 seconds apart. the last picture was at exactly 2200hrs when the glowing sphere just dissapeared. i thought the pictures would all come out w\a black sky & a white dot in the center, but when i got home and examined the pictures, they show that it moved positions, changed shape, and the last picture i'd have to say it had to have moved incredibly fast because it looks elongated. after, we got back in the car, i still felt uneasy, like it was still there but invisible.. it was the first time, i actually got one on camara. first one i've ever reported. let me know what u think. my mufon name is zigmatah
